SA11sanss12u:359: jātismarāḥ satvā bhavantu sarve jātīśataṃ jātisahasrakoṭyaḥ /
SA11sanss12u:360: anusmarantū satataṃ munîndrān śṛṇvantu teṣāṃ vacanaṃ hy udāraṃ //
SA11sanss12u:361: anena cô dundubhighoṣanādinā labhantu buddhehi samāgamaṃ sadā /
SA11sanss12u:362: vivarjayantū khalu pāpakarma carantu kuśalāni śubhakriyāṇi //
SA11sanss12u:363: sarvatra kṣetreṣu ca sarvaprāṇināṃ sarve ca duṣkhāḥ praśamantu loke /
SA11sanss12u:364: ye satva vikalêndriyâṅgahīnāḥ te sarvi sakalêndriya bhontu sāṃpratam //
SA11sanss12u:365: ye vyādhitā durbalakṣīṇagātrā nistrāṇabhūtāḥ śayitā diśāsu /
SA11sanss12u:366: te sarvi mucyantu ca vyādhito laghu labhantu cârogya balêndriyāṇi //
SA11sanss12u:367: ye rājacaurabhaṭa tarjita vadhyaprāptā nānāvidhair bhayaśatair vyasanôpapannāḥ /
SA11sanss12u:370: rvi satva vyasanâgataduṣkhitā hi mucyantu tair bhayaśataiḥ paramaiḥ sughoraiḥ //
SA11sanss12u:372: ye tāḍitā bandhanabaddhapīḍitā vividheṣu vyasaneṣu ca saṃsthitāhi /
SA11sanss12u:374: te sarvi mucyantv iha bandhanebhyaḥ saṃtāḍitā mucyiṣu tāḍanebhyaḥ /
SA11sanss12u:375: vadhyāś ca saṃyujyiṣu jīvitena vyasanâgatā nirbhaya bhontu sarve //
SA11sanss12u:376: ye satva kṣuttarṣapipāsapīḍitā labhantu te bhojanapānacitram /
SA11sanss12u:377: andhāś ca paśyantu vicitrarūpāṃ badhirāś ca śṛṇvantu manojñaghoṣān //
SA11sanss12u:378: nagnāś ca vastrāṇi labhantu citrāṃ daridrasatvāś ca nidhiṃ labhantu /
SA11sanss12u:379: prabhūtadhanadhānyavicitraratnaiḥ sarve ca satvāḥ sukhino bhavantu //
SA11sanss12u:380: mā kasyacid bhāvatu duṣkhavedanāḥ saukhyânvitāḥ satva bhavantu sarve /
SA11sanss12u:382: manasânnapānāḥ susamṛddhapuṇyāḥ saha cittamātreṇa bhavantu teṣāṃ /
SA11sanss12u:383: vīṇā mṛdaṅgāḥ paṇavāḥ sughoṣakāḥ utsā sarāḥ puṣkariṇī taḍāgāḥ //
SA11sanss12u:384: suvarṇapadmôtpalapadminīś ca saha cittamātreṇa bhavantu teṣām /
SA11sanss12u:385: gandhaṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vilepanaṃ ca vāsaś ca cūrṇaṃ kusumaṃ vicitram //
SA11sanss12u:386: triṣkālavṛkṣebhi pravarṣayantu gṛhṇantu te satva bhavantu hṛṣṭāḥ /
SA11sanss12u:387: kurvantu pūjāṃ daśasū diśāsu acintiyāṃ sarvatathāgatānām //
SA11sanss12u:389: sa bodhisatvān atha śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmasya bodhi pratisṛṣṭi tasya /
SA11sanss12u:390: nīcāṃ gatiṃ satva vivarjayantu bhavantu aṣṭâkṣaṇavītivṛttāḥ //
SA11sanss12u:391: āsādayantū jinarājam uttamaṃ labhantu buddhehi samāgamaṃ sadā /
SA11sanss12u:392: sarvā striyo nitya narā bhavantu śūrāś ca vīrā vidupaṇḍitāś ca //
SA11sanss12u:393: te sarvi bodhāya carantu nityaṃ carantu te pāramitāsu ṣaṭsu /
SA11sanss12u:394: paśyantu buddhān daśasū diśāsu ratnadrumêndreṣu sukhôpaviṣṭān /
SA11sanss12u:406: yad idam avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvaj jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇam iti /
SA11sanss12u:407: avidyā cen nâbhaviṣyan nâiva saṃskārāḥ prājñāsyanta /
SA11sanss12u:408: evaṃ yāvad yadi jātir nâbhaviṣyan na jarāmaraṇaṃ prājñāsyata /
SA11sanss12u:409: atha satyām avidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇām abhinirvṛttir bhavati /
SA11sanss12u:410: evaṃ yāvaj jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyâbhinirvṛttir bhavati /
SA11sanss12u:418: ahaṃ jātyā nirvṛttêti /atha ca satyām avidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇām abhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA11sanss12u:419: evaṃ yāvaj jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyâbhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ //
SA11sanss12u:424: yad idaṃ pṛthivy-aptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyād ādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayôpanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ //
SA11sanss12u:426: yo 'yaṃ kāyasya saṃśleṣataḥ kaṭhinabhāvam abhinirvartayaty ayam ucyate pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
SA11sanss12u:427: yaḥ kāyasyânuparigrahaṃ kṛtyaṃ karoti ayam ucyate 'bdhātuḥ /
SA11sanss12u:428: yaḥ kāyasyâśitapītabhakṣitaṃ paripācayati ayam ucyate tejodhātuḥ /
SA11sanss12u:432: yaḥ kāyasyântaḥsauṣiryabhāvam abhinirvartayaty ayam ucyate ākāśadhātuḥ /
SA11sanss12u:433: yo nāmarūpam abhinirvartayati naḍakalāpayogena pañcavijñānakāyasaṃprayuktaṃ sâsravaṃ ca manovijñānam ayam ucyate vijñānadhātuḥ //
SA11sanss12u:435: yadâdhyātmikaḥ pṛthivīdhātur avikalo bhavaty evam aptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātavaś câvikalā bhavanti /
SA11sanss12u:451: atha ca satsv eṣu pratyayeṣu kāyasyôtpattir bhavati /
SA11sanss12u:452: tatra pṛthivīdhātur nâtmā na satvo na jīvo na jantur na manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ /
SA11sanss12u:456_0: evam abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātur na satvo na jīvo na
SA11sanss12u:456_1: jantur na manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na câhaṃ na mama na câpy
SA11sanss12u:457: yâiṣv eva ṣaṭsu dhātuṣv ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñâtmasaṃjñā satvajīvamanujamānavasaṃjñā /
SA11sanss12u:462: evam avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ viṣayeṣu rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante /
SA11sanss12u:463: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣv amī ucyante saṃskārêti /
SA11sanss12u:466: catvāri ca mahābhūtāni côpādāyôpādāya r ūpam aikadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya tan nāmarūpaṃ /
SA11sanss12u:482: punar aparaṃ tatve 'pratipattiḥ mithyā pratipattiḥ ajñānam avidyā /
SA11sanss12u:489: puṇyôpagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyôpagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss12u:490: apuṇyôpagānāṃ saṃskārāṇām apuṇyôpagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss12u:491: āniñjyôpagānāṃ saṃskārāṇām āniñjyôpagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss12u:496: ṣaḍbhyâyatanebhyaḥ ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ pravartante 'yaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśêty ucyate /
SA11sanss12u:497: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
SA11sanss12u:503: mā me priyarūpaśātarūpair viyogo bhavatv iti /
SA11sanss12u:506: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā /
SA11sanss12u:508: yā karmanirjātānāṃ skandhānām abhinirvṛttiḥ sā bhavapratyayā jātir ity ucyate /
SA11sanss12u:509: yo jātyabhinirvṛttānāṃ skandhānām upacayaparipākād vināśo bhavati /
SA11sanss12u:521: atha cêmāny asya dvādaśâṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāri aṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante /
SA11sanss12u:532: asatāṃ yeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ bījasyâbhinirvṛttir na bhavati //tatra karmaṇo nâivaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss12u:537: vijñānabījasyâpi nâivaṃ bhavaty aham ebhiḥ pratyayair janitêti /
SA11sanss12u:544: sa ca nāmarūpâṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nôbhayakṛto nêśvarâdinirmito na kālapariṇāmito na câikakāraṇâdhīno nâpy ahetusamutpannaḥ /
SA11sanss12u:545: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogād ṛtusamavāyād anyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyād āsvādânupraviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpâṅkurabījam abhinirvartayati /
SA11sanss12u:546: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣv amameṣv aparigraheṣv apratyarthikeṣv ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānām avaikalyāt //
SA11sanss12u:547: tad yathā pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiś cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate /
SA11sanss12u:549: cakṣuś ca pratītya rūpaṃ câlokaṃ câkāśaṃ tajjaṃ ca manasikāraṃ ca pratītyôtpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ //
SA11sanss12u:556: yadā cakṣur ādhyātmikam āyatanam avikalaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss12u:571: atha ca punaḥ satsv eṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyôtpattir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA11sanss12u:573: tatra na kaścid dharmo 'smāl lokāt paraṃ lokaṃ saṃkrāmati /
SA11sanss12u:581: evam eva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatra tatrôtpattyāyatanapratisandhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpâṅkuram abhinirvartayati /
SA11sanss12u:582: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣv amameṣv aparigraheṣv apratyarthikeṣv ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānām avaikalyāt //
SA11sanss12u:583: tan nâdhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇair draṣṭavyaḥ //
SA11sanss12u:589: na tu yae eva māraṇântikāḥ skandhās tae evâupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhā /
SA11sanss12u:590: api tu māraṇântikāś ca skandhā nirudhyamānâupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāś ca prādurbhavanti /
SA11sanss12u:593: na ca niruddheṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti nâpy aniruddheṣu /
SA11sanss12u:594: api tu māraṇântikāś ca skandhā nirudhyante 'upapattyaṃśikāś ca prādurbhavanti /
SA11sanss12u:598: visadṛśāt satvanikāyād dhi sabhāgāḥ skandhā jātyantare 'bhinirvartante /
SA11sanss12u:609_0: yaḥ kaścid bhadanta śāriputrêmaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ bhagavatā samyakpraṇītam evaṃ
SA11sanss12u:609_1: yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitam ajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvad aviparītam ajātam
SA11sanss12u:609_2: abhūtam akṛtam asaṃskṛtam apratigham anāvaraṇaṃ śivam abhayam ahāryam avyayam avyupaśamam
SA11sanss12u:610: asatyatas tucchata ṛktato 'sārato 'ghato 'nityato duṣkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmanaś ca samanupaśyati /
SA11sanss12u:612: kim aham abhūvam atīte 'dhvany āho svin nâbhūvam atīte 'dhvani /
SA11sanss12u:615: kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmy anāgate 'dhvany āho svin na bhaviṣyāmy anāgate 'dhvani /
SA11sanss12u:618: kiṃ svid idaṃ kathaṃ svid idaṃ /
SA11sanss12u:639: hanta vayam evaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ viditvâsya saṃyogasyâsyāś ca sāmagryā vyavacchedaṃ kariṣyāmo /
